resources.string_add: Sorry, this content is no longer available. It may have been removed or is not accessible due to violation of our terms of service.

resources.string_upd:
{email_header}

Hello {name} ({email}),

Please confirm your email address by clicking the link below:

{conf_link}

or use the code:

{conf_code}

{email_footer}

Your email address is unconfirmed. Please, check your email ({1}) for a confirmation letter and click email confirmation link or use confirmation code (6 digit) to confirm your email. Can't find the letter? Check your SPAM folder or send the verification letter again.
